entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
In this years' summer, I finally convinced myself to publish my sideprojects and tinkering as someone who enjoys software, coding and tech.

This will be my way of giving something back to the community, which has helped me so much in my own journey.

From top of my head, this will be:

  • Something with Go and Zig
  • A project I wanted to try out with running k3s (Kubernetes for small places), storage and networking
  • My switch from VSCode to Helix (with Zellij, fzf, ripgrep and yazi)
  • Setting up a DNS sinkhole with a raspberry pi
  • Creating a Corne MX ergonomic keyboard from scratch
entry.summary: In this years' summer, I finally convinced myself to publish my sideprojects and tinkering as someone who enjoys software, coding and tech. This will be my way of giving something back to the community, which has helped me so much in my own journey.
